alert.note: Alert for Montgomery (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued May 02 at 2:34PM CDT until May 02 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Dust Storm Warning for... Northern Montgomery County in south central Illinois... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 233 PM CDT, blowing dust was causing severely reduced visibility in northern Montgomery County, affecting Interstate 55. HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility in blowing dust with strong wind in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Law enforcement. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. * This includes Interstate 55 in Illinois near exit 63. Locations impacted include... Nokomis, Raymond, Witt, White Oak, Farmersville, Coalton, Waggoner, Harvel, Ohlman, and Wenonah. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
